1.0.name: wordpress/automatic-newsletter
1.0.description: This plugin will send a newsletter to everyone on your email list. You can specify how many recent posts it will send in the newsletter options under settings. You can also specify how often it sends it with the choices of daily,weekly or monthly. It also comes with a newsletter widget which will allow users to sign up to the newsletter.
